## WorkspaceSvg.createDom() method

Create the workspace DOM elements.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createDom(opt_backgroundClass?: string, injectionDiv?: HTMLElement): Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_backgroundClass | string | _(Optional)_ Either 'blocklyMainBackground' or 'blocklyMutatorBackground'. |
|  injectionDiv | HTMLElement | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Element

The workspace's SVG group.
